@@ -342,1 +342,7 @@
-    peer = mercurial.hg.peer(ui or repo, opts, ui.expandpath(path))
+    try:
+        peer = mercurial.hg.peer(ui or repo, opts, ui.expandpath(path))
+    except:
+        from mercurial import utils
+        origsource, remote_path, branch = utils.urlutil.get_clone_path(ui, path)
+        peer = mercurial.hg.peer(repo, opts, remote_path)
+
